short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that creates a filters menu bar on GitHub so that you can show/hide file types for pull requests.

long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,es,es_419,et,: If you do pull requests that have a lot of files and you only need to review certain file types, then this is the extension for you. A dynamic toolbar will appear underneath GitHub's main navigation bar which will give you buttons to show or hide individual file types or show/hide all file types. Each file type filter button also shows the number of times that file type is present within the pull request.
long.am,bn,en,en_AU,en_US,fa,gu,kn,ml,mr,sr,s: If you manage pull requests that have a lot of files and you only need to review certain file types, then this is the extension for you. A dynamic toolbar will appear underneath GitHub's main navigation bar which will give you buttons to show or hide individual file types or show/hide all file types. Each file type filter button also shows the number of times that file type is present within the pull request. When on the /pulls/ page the navigation bar will allow you to filter the requesters of the available pull requests on the page.
